title: Smart Data Models - WindPlantUserDefined
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Wind plant function block whose dynamic behaviour is described by

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindPlantUserDefined

ProprietaryParameterDynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Parameter of this proprietary user-defined model. Default: 'list'

proprietary.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Behaviour is based on proprietary model as opposed to detailed model. true = user-defined model is proprietary with behaviour mutually understood by sending and receiving applications and parameters passed as general attributes false = user-defined model is explicitly defined in terms of control blocks and their input and output signals. Default: False
